game.name: Everglen
game.shortDescription: Build your dream farm in a cozy pixel RPG. Grow crops, fish, mine, and explore a charming island full of secrets. Meet unique NPCs, craft and trade items, and uncover magical surprises at your own pace. Relax, explore, and create your story in this farming adventure.
